Miss Me Once.name: Miss Me Once
Miss Me Once.flavor: You dodge an enemy’s attack, then look at him as though he were already dead.
Miss Me Once.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you that you can see misses you with an attack.
Miss Me Once.effect: The enemy grants combat advantage until the start of its next turn.

Skirmish Ploy.name: Skirmish Ploy
Skirmish Ploy.flavor: You score a glancing blow, which you turn into an opportunity to thrust your enemy out of position and into the path of a nearby ally.
Skirmish Ploy.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. In addition, you slide the target up to 2 squares, and an ally within 2 squares of you can shift 1 square closer to the target as a free action.

Superior Tactics.name: Superior Tactics
Superior Tactics.flavor: Your experience on the battlefield allows you to deal terrible wounds to your enemy and also brings out the best in your allies.
Superior Tactics.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grant an action point to an ally within 10 squares of you who has not spent an action point during this encounter. The action point disappears if it’s not used by the end of the encounter.
Superior Tactics.onMiss: One ally within 10 squares of you can make a basic attack as a free action.
